```{r}
library(quarto)
library(magrittr)

lq <- list.files(pattern = '.qmd')
for(qq in lq) quarto_render(qq)

lf <- list.files('_site', pattern = '\\.', full.names = TRUE)
file.copy(lf, to = '.', overwrite = TRUE)

git2r::add(repo = '~/RStudio/1johnreaves.github.io/', path = '*')
```
